name: The Passport Membership Club
description:
Dual Nation Jewellery is now offering an exclusive membership club - The Passport, with three different membership options.

BRONZE PASSPORT HOLDER - £36: 
As a Dual Nation Jewellery BRONZE member, each month for three months, you'll receive a DN 'Piece Of The Month' jewellery. Your first piece of DN Jewellery will be sent on receipt of payment, with the second and third piece posted on the 1st of each month thereafter. 'Piece Of The Month' jewellery can include any piece from Dual Nation's current collection of statement rings, necklaces, earrings and bracelets. 

SILVER PASSPORT HOLDER £60: 
As a Dual Nation Jewellery SILVER member, each month for three months, you'll receive a DN 'Piece Of The Month' jewellery. With a SILVER Passport, you'll also receive a £20 gift voucher to spend on all Dual Nation Jewellery products.

GOLD PASSPORT HOLDER - £105: 
As a Dual Nation Jewellery GOLD member, each month for three months, you'll receive a DN 'Piece Of The Month' jewellery.  With a GOLD Passport, you'll also receive a £30 gift voucher to spend on all Dual Nation Jewellery products and a FREE personalised piece of jewellery which could include a name necklace, your choice of design/image on one of our DN products, or a personal commissioned piece.

On top of  the BRONZE, SILVER and GOLD membership, all Dual Nation Passport holders are also entitled to exclusive online offers such as discounts, VIP sales, previews of new collections and limited edition products!

categories.name: Not All Those Who Wander Are Lost
